title: Nutanix Announces New Global Partnership to Run SAP® Business Applications on Advanced Web-Scale Infrastructure
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/13/2015 @ 12:00 AM   Nutanix, Inc. 
SAN JOSE, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Nutanix , the next-generation enterprise computing company, today announced a global partnership with SAP (NYSE: SAP) that enables customers to leverage the Nutanix web-scale infrastructure solution to run their business-critical SAP® applications. These include enterprise resource management (ERP), business warehouse, customer relationship management (CRM) and more. The Nutanix Xtreme Computing Platform (XCP), a leading hyperconverged infrastructure solution certified for SAP applications, is now on the supported hardware list for the SAP NetWeaver® technology platform. 
Nutanix XCP is now ready to run SAP enterprise applications on a wide range of high-performance platforms, including VMware vSphere, that can dramatically simplify the deployment, management and scaling of datacenter infrastructure. Unlike traditional converged architectures, Nutanix solutions natively integrate server, storage and virtualization resources into a simple scale-out appliance that can help customers reduce the high cost and complexity of their legacy hardware architectures. According to a study validated by IDC 1 , customers using the Nutanix XCP reduce their total cost of ownership by an average of 58%, deploy storage up to 85% faster and experience up to 98% fewer occurrences of unplanned downtime, when compared to traditional infrastructure products. 
“Nutanix is proud to have met SAP’s stringent testing criteria to become a supported platform for running SAP NetWeaver and nearly all SAP business applications,” said Sunil Potti, Nutanix senior vice president of engineering and product management. “This partnership will make advanced web-scale infrastructure available to thousands of SAP customers globally, enabling more agile and cost-effective IT.” 
In addition to offering full compatibility between best-in-class products, Nutanix and SAP have entered into a collaborative technical support agreement designed to help give customers a more seamless support experience when optimizing their environment and resolving issues. This partnership will also allow customers take advantage of Nutanix worldwide support experts, that rate an impressive 9.3 out of 10 in customer satisfaction and yield one of the industry’s best Net Promoter Scores – averaging 90 during the past year. 
“The new hyperconverged solution from Nutanix will enable our customers to scale their businesses quicker while reducing IT complexity,” said Kevin Ichhpurani, executive vice president for business development and strategic ecosystem, SAP. “With the SAP-certified offering from Nutanix, organizations can now run their critical SAP applications in production leveraging the power of VMware vSphere on the Nutanix platform.”

References 
1 “Quantifying the Business Value of Nutanix Solutions.” IDC Research. August 2015. 
About Nutanix 
Nutanix delivers invisible infrastructure for next-generation enterprise computing, elevating IT to focus on the applications and services that power their business. The company’s software-driven Xtreme Computing Platform natively converges compute, virtualization and storage into a single solution to drive simplicity in the datacenter. Using Nutanix, customers benefit from predictable performance, linear scalability and cloud-like infrastructure consumption. Learn more at www.nutanix.com or follow up on Twitter @nutanix .
